message: Let's split it fairly, Bob. I think this is a good starting point.
Let's try a bit more in my favor, Alice.
Bob, my turn to propose something a bit more in my favor. We're losing money with every round!
I know the inflation is affecting you more, Alice. But I'm willing to walk away if I don't get a better deal.
Bob, let's be real. This is getting ridiculous. We're both losing money.  50/50 is the only fair split at this point.
